name: Ashley
comment: Jurassic World is a thrilling movie that brings the iconic dinosaurs back to the big screen in a big way. The action is intense, the visuals are stunning, and the story is engaging. A great movie for anyone who loves dinosaurs or action movies.

name: Tyler
comment: Jurassic World is a decent movie that delivers on the thrills and excitement that you would expect from a dinosaur movie. The plot can be a bit predictable at times, but the action and special effects are still impressive.
